name: WordPress Visitors
author: http://jakir.newstylebd.com/

sections.description:
This is wordpress visitors counter plugins. when install this plugins autometically create a table, name wp-counter_total and created a widget. this widgets show three options.
1. current visitors
2. todays visitors
3. total visitors

and when any visitor, any place who browse your website then automaetically change your visitors number without page refresh.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)

short_description: It's a simple plugin to count your website's current visitor, todays hits, total hits without page refresh.
description:
This is wordpress visitors counter plugins. when install this plugins autometically create a table, name wp-counter_total and created a widget. this widgets show three options.
1. current visitors
2. todays visitors
3. total visitors

and when any visitor, any place who browse your website then automaetically change your visitors number without page refresh.
